name: Carte / CSS4J
short_description:
This Java-based reporting/publishing framework is considered obsolete and is abandoned.

Downloads of a CSS library developed for this project (and named CSS4J) are available from the 'Files' tab (http://sourceforge.net/projects/carte/files/css4j/), and also from http://code.google.com/p/css4j/

Note that this project's CSS4J is unrelated to Sourceforge's 'css4j' project, a different project that decided to use the same name as the above mentioned library. This project was the first to use the CSS4J name and publish source code under it, in February of 2006. The 'other' CSS4J was created in October of that year.
summary: Reporting/publishing framework written in the Java language
